Destho

Concevoir presents DESTHO for architecture students to come forth and showcase their hard work and learnings on a larger platform.

The details are not the details, they make the design
Charles Eames

In the words of Frank Gehry, Architecture should speak of it's time and place but yearn for timelessness. The temperament of an architectural student is defined largely by their perspective and thoughts about architectural education. The awareness about the surroundings and an eye for minute detail makes an individual efficient and this understanding is reflected in a their work. Destho 2019 aims at evaluating the academic as well as extra-curricular work of the participants to identify not just the designing skills but also interpretational abilities, technical observations, aesthetic sense, and other essential skills.

Eligiblity

Open to all undergraduate students (I to V year)

Submission Details

Rules

  • Only individual work should be sent as entry. No combined projects will be entertained.
  • Work done in internship work should NOT be submitted.
  • Keep your word usage minimum and explain your ideas graphically.
  • Any misconduct such as revealing identity through college name/ stamp, participantâ€™s name on the sheets will lead to DISQUALIFICATION.

Requirements

  • The submission format should be PDF file and the number of sheets should be as per the citation. In case of file size exceeding 25MB, allow access to desthoconcevoir@gmail.com after uploading it on drive.
  • The sheets should have the unique code (to be provided on registration) on the upper right corner of each sheet.
  • DESTHO 2019 should be included as a part of the format.
  • Drawings and content should be readable.
  • Year:
    • Participants are required to submit works of 1st Semester and extracurriculars.
    • Maximum number of sheets: 3 A2s
  • Year:
    • Participants are required to submit works of 1st to 3rd Semester and extracurriculars.
    • Maximum number of sheets: 5 A2s
  • Year:
    • Participants are required to submit works of 1st to 5th Semester and extracurriculars.
    • Maximum number of sheets: 7 A2s
  • Year:
    • Participants are required to submit works of 1st to 7th Semester and extracurriculars.
    • Maximum number of sheets: 9 A2s
  • Year:
    • Participants are required to submit works of 1st to 9th Semester and extracurriculars.
    • Maximum number of sheets: 11 A2s

Prizes

Prizes worth 25,000 will be distributed as per the citation.

There shall be 5 awards in all-one each for every year of study.

  • I Year: 3,000 INR
  • II Year: 4,000 INR
  • III Year: 5,000 INR
  • IV Year: 6,000 INR
  • V Year: 7,000 INR
Schedule
Registration commencement 12th January 2019
Registration close 31st January 2019
Last date for submission 31 January 2019 12:00 AM IST
Queries entertained till 30th January 2019
Declaration of results 5th February 2019

Registration fees: 100 INR

Register here

After filling of the Google form, each participant will receive a mail regarding payment details.

Once the payment is confirmed, the participant will receive a mail containing a unique code.
